description:
Ayasegawa Yumichika is the exceedingly vain fifth seat of the eleventh protection squad. He is obsessed with beauty and reserves a burning hatred for anything he deems ugly. Despite his narcissistic ways, Yumichika is actually a very strong fighter and particularly loyal to his friends. His zanpakutou is named http://anidb.net/ch10813 [Ruri-iro Kujaku], though Yumichika calls it by the name of Fuji Kujaku.
Source: Anime-Planet
name: Ayasegawa Yumichika
